title: Kalptaru - The Ayurveda Place
description: No menu. Lunch set meals usually consists of a tea, "kitchuri" a thick soup of rice, beans, and veggies. Dinner set meals consists of a tea, rice, daal or potatoes, salad, chai (has milk) and sometimes chapati bread & chai tea. Vegans ask to have without ghee (butter). Moderate-expensive by local standard but affordable for foreigners. Price includes all you can eat refills. For directions, just ask one of the local foreigners for the Ayurvedic place.
